venue.name: Massabesic - Boat Launch to Battery Point

item.description:
From the boat launch to Battery Point the trail initially offers views of the lake then envelops walkers into a forest setting and finally delivers a 180 view of the lake like no other. At battery point a few yards in any direction reveal the grandeur of Massabesic Lake.

At a leisurely pace the entire trek can be completed in less than 2 hours. The meetup is timed to end with sunset.
item.how_to_find_us: Park on Rte 28 by pass close to the boat launch. Hugo & I will await the group a little beyond the launch area, past the gate. My car will be parked on Rte 28 with a meetup sign on the front windshield - light green Volvo Wagon Plates read EPRINT
item.why: Fun, fUn, fuN, FUn, FUN... need I say more?

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Massabesic Battery Point
